title: [P3d] Prepar3d V3.1 patch lockheed martin
description:

Update/patch Instructions
--this will not affect your current settings or addons--

You must first have Prepar3D v3.0 installed to utilize the Client only installer. To install the Prepar3D v3.1 Client, you must first uninstall the "Prepar3D v3.0 Client" via Programs and Features in Windows Control Panel (do not uninstall anythign other than the client). Run the client updater. The Prepar3D v3.1 Client update will require you to reactivate your product
